title: My Image Watch Face
summary: The image of smart watch(Android Wear), you can change from your smartphone.
description: The image of smart watch, you can change from your smartphone.Favorite idol, partners, please enjoy with photos of children.How to use1. Please select the image by pressing the "Select image" button.2. Please send the image by pressing the "Send image" button.3. Selected image is displayed on the clock .
descriptionHTML:
The image of smart watch, you can change from your smartphone.
Favorite idol, partners, please enjoy with photos of children.

How to use
1. Please select the image by pressing the "Select image" button.
2. Please send the image by pressing the "Send image" button.
3. Selected image is displayed on the clock .
